Module jext
Package jext

Class ExtensionManager

  • Object
    • ExtensionManager
  • public class ExtensionManager
extends Object
    Object that provides operations in order to retrieve instances of classes annotated with Extension.

    The intended purpose of this class is to be used as a singleton, but there is no actual constraint about that. Clients can create as many instances as they required, but being responsible of releasing references when they are no longer required (see clear()).

    • Constructor Summary

      • getExtension

        public <T> Optional<T> getExtension​(Class<T> extensionPoint)
        Retrieves an instance for the given extension point, if any exists. In the case of existing multiple alternatives, the one with highest priority will be used.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        Returns:
        An optional object either empty or wrapping the instance

      • getExtensionThatSatisfy

        public <T> Optional<T> getExtensionThatSatisfy​(Class<T> extensionPoint,
                                               Predicate<T> condition)
        Retrieves the instance for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition, if any exists. In the case of existing multiple alternatives, the one with highest priority will be used.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        condition - Only extensions satisfying this condition will be returned
        Returns:
        An optional object either empty or wrapping the instance

      • getExtensionThatSatisfyMetadata

        public <T> Optional<T> getExtensionThatSatisfyMetadata​(Class<T> extensionPoint,
                                                       Predicate<Extension> condition)
        Retrieves the instance for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition, if any exists. In the case of existing multiple alternatives, the one with highest priority will be used.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        condition - Only extensions which their metadata satisfies this condition will be returned
        Returns:
        An optional object either empty or wrapping the instance

      • getExtensionThatSatisfyMetadata

        public <T> Optional<T> getExtensionThatSatisfyMetadata​(Class<T> extensionPoint,
                                                       String provider,
                                                       String name,
                                                       String version)
        Retrieves the instance for the given extension point that satisfies the given provider, name and version, if any exists. The retrieved extension may be a higher but compatible version if exact version is not found.

        In the case of existing multiple alternatives, the one with highest priority will be used.

        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        provider - The extension provider
        name - The extension name
        version - The minimal version
        Returns:
        An optional object either empty or wrapping the instance

      • getExtensions

        public <T> Stream<T> getExtensions​(Class<T> extensionPoint)
        Retrieves a priority-ordered list with all extensions for the given extension point.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        Returns:
        A list with the extensions, empty if none was found

      • getExtensionsThatSatisfy

        public <T> Stream<T> getExtensionsThatSatisfy​(Class<T> extensionPoint,
                                              Predicate<T> condition)
        Retrieves a priority-ordered list with all then extensions for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        condition - Only extensions satisfying this condition will be returned
        Returns:
        A list with the extensions, empty if none was found

      • getExtensionsThatSatisfyMetadata

        public <T> Stream<T> getExtensionsThatSatisfyMetadata​(Class<T> extensionPoint,
                                                      Predicate<Extension> condition)
        Retrieves a priority-ordered list with all then extensions for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition.
        Parameters:
        extensionPoint - The extension point type
        condition - Only extensions which their metadata satisfies this condition will be returned
        Returns:
        A list with the extensions, empty if none was found

      • newSession

        public ExtensionManager newSession()
        Creates a new session of the extension manager. Each session will handle extensions marked with the ExtensionScope.SESSION scope in isolation, returning a singleton instance per session. Other scopes will be treated normally.

        Internally, each instance of ExtensionManager is considered an independent session, so this method is equivalent to: new ExtensionManager(extensionManager.classLoaders())

        IMPORTANT: Each session created should invoke the method clear() after being used. Otherwise, session extension instances might remain permanently in memory.

        Returns:
        A new extension manager that is isolated from the current in the session scope

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear any cached or referenced extension instances. This should be the last call prior to discard the manager.

        If you are using one ExtensionManager object as a singleton, usually there is no need to invoke this method. However, it is of major relevance when controlling the lifecycle of several instances.

        See Also:
        newSession()

      • classLoaders

        public List<ClassLoader> classLoaders()
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable list with the class loaders used by this manager
